title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
varx <- 9
covxy <- 1
vary <- 4
xbar <- 2
ybar <- 3
slope <- covxy/varx
intercept <- ybar - slope*xbar
covariance <- matrix(c(varx, covxy, covxy, vary), nrow=2);
center <- c(xbar, ybar)

n <- 100000
xy <- mvtnorm::rmvnorm(n, center, covariance)
x <- xy[1:n, 1]
y <- xy[1:n, 2]
lm(y ~ x)
slope
intercept
```
